title: Opposing Views on Israel and Palestine to be Debated (University of Massachusetts Amherst)
text: ( Source : University of Massachusetts Amherst ) The University Union , a campus student organization, is presenting a debate ' Opposing Views on Israel and Palestine ' on Tuesday, Oct. 27 from 7-8:30 p.m. in the Student Union Ballroom . The
